hero.heading: order up!
hero.contentOne: Code Reroute is a female-led tech company building the world's biggest restaurant app.

profiles.descriptionOne: Calling all software engineers, designers, marketing geniuses and every other profession involved in app dev.
profiles.descriptionTwo: We are Code Reroute, a tech company based in Canada building the world’s biggest restaurant app.
profiles.descriptionThree: We’re searching for like-minded individuals to join us in building this ambitious enterprise.

about.heading: MAPPETIZER
about.descriptionOne: Introducing mappetizer. Our mission is to revolutionize the way you experience restaurants. Discover and save restaurants into an interactive map— we’ve made the entire process easy.
about.descriptionTwo: Discover and save restaurants into an interactive map— we’ve made the entire process easy.

contents.contentOne: We are searching for restaurateurs to provide feedback about our app. If that sounds like you, please reach out to learn more.
contents.contentTwo: We look forward to connecting with you.

services.heading: ADDITIONAL SERVICES
services.description: Imagine having us in your back pocket? Hire us on retainer for these services or as a one-time deal.

0.heading: BRAND PHOTOGRAPHY
0.paragraphOne: If you're investing in a website, don't forget about the importance of photography. Our in-house photographers have strong insight into which type of photography will serve you best.
0.paragraphTwo: Photography should communicate a story to an audience and we are skilled at curating a portfolio of images that can be used for digital or print media.

1.heading: LOGOS & VISUAL IDENTITIES
1.smallHeading: Providing straightforward guidelines for you and your team
1.paragraphOne: Crafting a visual identity (or refreshing an existing one) is the starting point from which all other projects can stem from.
1.paragraphTwo: Having a strong visual identity (and also knowing your mission, vision, values and brand story) is essential for being able to communicate effectively to your audience.
1.paragraphThree: We work closely with our clients to draft up a comprehensive visual identity and provide support for integrating the guidelines seamlessly into an existing workflow.

2.heading: STRATEGIC MARKETING FRAMEWORK
2.smallHeading: Putting all the moving pieces together
2.paragraphOne: With a background in marketing & communications, Danielle has the skills for developing a strategic marketing plan.
2.paragraphTwo: Defining goals, identifying audiences, and finding appropriate marketing channels is the first step in the process.
2.paragraphThree: With the proper planning in place, we guide our clients towards their vision, purpose and goals.

employment.heading: EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES
employment.paragraphOne: Work in an exciting atmosphere with a team that makes an impact. Fully remote, flexible hours and minimal meetings.
employment.paragraphTwo: We welcome people of all backgrounds and ages to reach out to us. If you enjoy working with a small and dedicated team, please fill out the form below.

team.heading: OUR TEAM
team.paragraphOne: We are a nimble group focused on building innovative tech and writing clean code. Together, we are highly collaborative, self-motivated and constantly curious— the dream team!
team.paragraphTwo: We value open communication, helping each other with complex logic and mentoring each other to be the best developers in the industry.

usman.name: Usman Ahmed
bio: Usman is a skilled Software Engineer with a passion for tech and innovation. His main experience includes React.js for frontend development and Nest.js for backend work. His proficiency in these technologies has allowed him to create robust, user-friendly web applications. Additionally, he has a keen interested in gaming, e-sports and optimizing PC components.

nabah.name: Nabah Sheikh
bio: As a recent computer science graduate, Nabah is a brilliant Software Engineer with a passion for artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning. Her skills include Amazon Web Services (AWS), TypeScript, NestJS, Postman API and API testing. Additionally, she is an active member in the tech community of Karachi, Pakistan earning the prestigious ‘Honorable Mention’ at the UN World Innovation Day Hackathon.

ahmed.name: Ahmed Ashfaq
bio: A Full Stack Software Engineer specializing in front-end development with a tech stack that includes React Native, React.js, and Next.js. Currently pursuing a Master's in Artificial Intelligence from Asia Pacific University in Malaysia. Passionate about networking and loves connecting with tech-minded individuals.

bilal.name: Bilal Siddique
bio: Bilal loves exploring and learning new technologies, always seeking to expand his expertise. He has extensive experience in backend development and DevOps, working with Node.js/Nest.js, Next.js, Remix, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, and AWS services like EKS, ECS, VPC, and IAM. His diverse skill set enables him to craft seamless and impactful digital solutions. Beyond his passion for tech, Bilal is a foodie who enjoys discovering new cuisines and loves watching comedy shows.

haseeb.name: Haseeb Khalid
bio: Haseeb is a skilled Software Engineer specializing in UI design. He excels at crafting user-friendly and engaging interfaces. Outside of work, Haseeb enjoys playing FIFA and tries to learn new coding languages, with a particular focus on Python. His mix of design skills and tech enthusiasm fuels his drive for continuous improvement in software development
